tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ****** ** *** **** ***** * **** *** **** *****
She gets the problem with the patient at the first meet itself. To cure or manage any ailment, it needs to be diagnosed correctly first. 
Dr. Shilpa took appropriate details about my medical history and made accurate diagnosis of my endometriosis. Struggling with pain every month, I almost started accepting the pain as my fate because nobody actually believed me. Dr. Shilpa always is concerned with my pain and my issues, answers my questions, worries and supports me morally to recover.
I believe her and looking forward for pain free life ahead.
Thankyou Dr Shilpa.
Endometriosis is tough, get it diagnosed, talk to your gynac and stop suffering alone...

One must visit her and you  yourself going to like the entire follow up and in going process of the treatment and suggestions she will provide to you. She just makes one feel like home in the click and during the on going test process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shilpa Bansal came highly recommended to me for my first visit to a gynaecologist, and I must say, my family and I were truly impressed. She exhibits a rare quality of attentively listening and offering advice with a comforting friendship. Her empathetic nature creates a soothing and welcoming environment, making the experience exceptionally positive. Dr. Bansal's respectful approach of seeking consent before examinations instilled a sense of complete ease in me. I unequivocally recommend her to anyone in search of exceptional care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had an exceptional experience with Dr. Shilpa. She had made my 9 months of expecting our little one a pleasure. She always gives enough time to listen attentively to all my concerns and had been proactive in checking any issues that might have arrived in the course of my pregnancy. Along with being a great doctor, she is also an excellent counselor. Her advice on any matter regarding my health or lifestyle has been spot on. I highly recommend Dr. Shilpa for anyone seeking a knowledgeable and empathetic gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my 1st time visiting De Shilpa. I am out of country resident, not local. I was pleasantly surprised at the organized system of everything right from making my 1st phone call to make appointment until my check out. It was of international level.  The staff and nurse Swapnali are friendly, warm and professional. They explained everything e ery step of the way. The doctor os simply amazing. She is warm ,friendly. Has a gr8 positive vibe and a calming personality.  She explained me my questions with patience and clarity. She didnot subscribe me any extras. She was considerate of my time and money. 

I was very happy I chose to see Dr Shilpa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Shilpa Bansal operated me for Hysteroscopic polypectomy, D & C (Dilation and curettage, cauterization.

Dr Shilpa Bansal is very confident, friendly, polite and attends to all your queries, fears and doubts till not a single iota of doubt remains in your mind.  She explains you all that you need to know. Her entire staff is also very polite and confident.  I opted BSES hospital. Dr Shilpa made all the arrangements much prior. She is very punctual. Excellent before, during and post operative follow ups. I have totally recovered now . Thanks Dr Shilpa Bansal.

I will surely recommend Dr. Shilpa Bansal because she listens to her patient's need and make them feel not just comfortable but sheltered. I truly adore her and she is the best trust me‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

review: ** ****** ** * ********* ******* She is very patient and empathetic. She understands your concerns whichever they may be and helps to put your mind at ease. She's very gentle yet firm as a doctor and is always very positive. review: What an amazing Doctor!!! She has in depth knowledge about anything you ask her.. Half of your illness is cured with the way she speaks. She is a 10/10‚Ä¶.I would totally recommend her‚Ä¶I wish I knew her earlier.. I am totally satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Bansal was extremely pleasant, approachable and understanding. She gave me a patient hearing as I listed all my concerns & took time to explain the issues to me. She was extremely polite & absolutely professional. She made me feel comfortable and aside from gynaecology, she took time to counsel me on related issues as well. She is an absolutely charming, very likeable person who is a very sincere and thoroughly professional doctor as well. I would highly recommend her to everyone.
Dr. Shilpa explains issues and treatment options well. She was also clear that she won't recommend meds unnecessarily as simply better habits can improve my condition. That was comforting.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the clinic after seeing reviews on Google. I had booked an appointment at 7:15 pm but the entrance to the clinic was so complicated (a long walk around the building because the shorter route to it was closed) that I reached 5 minutes later than I would. On arriving, there were 6 people already before me - making it completely pointless to even take an appointment. I had to wait for an hour to meet the gynaec. She was nice. They took a urine sample and they told me theyll give me the results the next day. So far, not so bad. The next day, they told me I had a mild UTI and had to take antibiotics for 7 days. I took them; ******** *** ******** **** *** ****** I asked them to suggest a cream to relieve the itchiness and they suggested lulifin cream.  * ******* ** *** ** ****** **** ** ** * ***** *** ** ** **** **** *** ******* I was confused and obviously concerned about what I use on my body ** * **** **** * ********** ** ** *** asked them whether it was safe to use around the vagina. I guess they got too offended and told me they couldn‚Äôt treat me anymore and asked me to visit a dermatologist lol. Ive been asking them to email me my urine report too but they simply ignore my request. Horrible experience!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Bansal treated me well for an STI but offered me unsolicited life advice towards the end of the treatment. * *** **** ** **** ******* *** *** ******* * ****. she prescribed me a birth control pill to help with acne and severe dysmenorrhea. however she strongly encouraged me to take a break from the pill every 12 months and threatened to not renew the prescription if I did not take it. I had no intention of trying to conceive. ***** * ***** ********* ** ***** ****** **** ** **** ****** ****** *** ** ****** *** ************ **** *** ********* ******** **** ** *** *****. I called doctor from abroad to get her opinion on why my cramps were back after being on the pill *** *** ***** ***** *** *** *** ****** ** ** ****** ****** *** **** *** ** ********** *** ******* ** ** **** ** *** * *** ****** ** *** ********* I would not recommend going to her ** *** *** ******* *** ********* ******* ****** ***********
Dr. Shilpa makes you feel so comfortable, very patient and  explains everything so well.  **** ************ *** * ****** *******

I love the way she handed cases and I love her positivity like if you are going to any gynecologist the dr have to be very positive then only U can think positive. Thank you mam for all efforts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We were looking for a good gynaecologist for our first pregnancy. I searched web for nearby gynaecologist and in the list, I saw Dr. Shilpa Bansal and my gut feeling said that she would the right doctor for us. So we went ahead and met her and we are glad we did. She was so friendly, patient , answered all our queries without any rush.
My first delivery was done by her and believe me the journey was not easy. Every scan report had some or the other issues. But she was always there to guide us at every step and finally we all made it through. All thanks to her. I can speak to her just like my elder sister because she has made me feel so comfortable around her. I think that kind of ease and genuineness is very rare to find these days. I would highly recommend her to everyone out there who are in search of a gynaecologist. We cannot thank you enough Dr. Shilpa for all your help and guidance and for being there throughout my first pregnancy journey and even post that :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Painful Sexual Intercourse,PCOS,Sexually Transmitted Infection,Acne in Periods,Painful Periods,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************** **** **** ******* I've been going to her for 1.5 years now for PCOS treatment and birth control. in the middle she even treated me for an STI, and was super understanding, non-judgmental, and graceful about the entire process. does not prescribe tests or medicines for no reason and explains everything in great detail and very gently without making any assumptions or judgements on character which is a rare quality in my experience. she is direct and pragmatic in her approach and makes the patient feel comfortable and safe. would highly recommend if you are single and looking for somewhere discreet and progressive. thank you Dr Shilpa!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If you have any problem regarding your health and you want a good doctor you must without wasting any time consult her. I think the word doctor is less for her so we call her scientist... When I went to her I was very upset but when I consulted her she raised my confidence and bought a postive feeling in me and today because of her I am a mother of two babies. She works for blessings rather than money. My case was very critical but she saved my life. I have never seen God in my life but I think I met him in her form. review: We strongly recommend Dr Shilpa,  for PCOS treatment. Even with Pcos,  we have 1 beautiful daughter, all because of Dr Shilpa's guidance and all medical help.  She is very friendly and very positive in all terms to help us. Thank you so much Dr. Shilpa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Shilpa is very calm and reassuring. She heard me very patiently, and explained to me very calmly about pcos. Above all, she didn't unnecessarily prescribe me medicines since my PCOS symptoms were very mild. I felt super relaxed after my appointment and I'm definitely gonna go back if i ever have any issues in future.

Neither the reception or the doctor asked me the age-old archaic question of whether I'm miss or mrs which was very refreshing.
